summary: rotate hue of current colorscheme (GUI only).
name: huerotation.vim
description:
Hue is one of component of HSV color model. 
You can rotate hue of current colorscheme.

This plugin requires vim7.2 for Float feature.

Usage:
  :call RotateHue(60)

Reference:
  EasyRGB - Color mathematics and conversion formulas.:
    http://www.easyrgb.com/math.php
  Wikipedia - HSL and HSV
    http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HSL_and_HSV

versions.release_notes: bug fix: use default color when fg or bg is empty.
